definition: A phrase commonly used to express the concept of "every moment" or "every instant." It is often employed to convey the idea of something happening or occurring at any given time, emphasizing the continuous nature of an action or event.

examples.english: She can call at any moment.

examples.german: Er ist jeden Augenblick bereit zu helfen.
examples.english: He is ready to help at any moment.
